messages.details: Prohibited VkFormat VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 must not be used in a KTX2 file.

messages.message: Invalid transferFunction for basic DFD block. For an sRGB vkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
